nasal.load: ############################################################################## # The on-load Nasal is not executed when this file is loaded as the user # aircraft. ############################################################################## var rplayer = cmdarg(); # Set up property aliases for animations. rplayer.getNode("mig29/weapons/podv/T3", 1). alias(rplayer.getNode("sim/multiplay/generic/int[29]")); ##############################################################################

PropertyList.animation:
select R-73 R-73.DUA1 R-73.DUA2. R-73.DUA3 R-73.DUA4 R-73.Destabs R-73.RuliP1 R-73.RuliP2 R-73.RuliP3 R-73.RuliP4 R-73.L R-73.Krepl R-73.Wings R-73.RuliZ1 R-73.RuliZ2 R-73.RuliZ3 R-73.RuliZ4 R-73.Nozzle R-73.ND1 R-73.ND2 R-73.ND3 R-73.ND4
mig29/weapons/podv/T3 4
